EmailTemplate.description: Re-admission Offer - Confirmation to DEPT (before emailing student)
EmailTemplate.name: Re-admission Offer - Confirmation to DEPT (before emailing student)
EmailTemplate.subject: MUM Re-admission Letter Confirmation – {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please find attached MUM offer letter for (Student). Could you please check the offer letter to ensure all of the information and content are correct. Once I receive your confirmation, I will issue the offer letter to the student.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
